title: How Democrats Used the Abortion Debate to Hold Off a Red Wave
description: In the first major election post-Roe, Democrats tied abortion rights to everyday economics and tapped into fears about the rise of right-wing Republicans.
dc:creator: Lisa Lerer and Elizabeth Dias
media:credit: Emily Elconin for The New York Times
media:description: An abortion rights supporter last week in Taylor, Mich. The resolution passed.
